title: London police officer Wayne Couzens gets life sentence without parole for Sarah Everard murder
content:
1. London police officer Wayne Couzens gets life sentence without parole for Sarah Everard murder  The Washington Post
  2. Sarah Everard handcuffed and falsely arrested before she was murdered, court told  Channel 4 News
  3. UK officer accused of citing COVID rules to detain woman slain  The Detroit News
  4. Sarah Everard murder: What do I tell my daughter? - Jacqui Merrington  Bristol Live
  5. CCTV shows moment Sarah Everard stopped by Wayne Couzens  The Telegraph
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ロンドンの警察官ウェイン・クーゼンズ、サラ・エベラード殺害で仮釈放なしの終身刑に
伦敦警察Wayne Couzens因谋杀Sarah Everard而被判处终身监禁，不得假释
